00091 
00092             //store new values to DB
00093             IDataProvider data = DataProvider.CreateInstance();
00094             if (data.UpdateCompMatrix(level, high, med, low, new TransactionFailedHandler(this.TransactionFailed)))
00095             {
00096                 //make sure nothing is being edited, and reload the page
00097                 compMatrixGrid.EditItemIndex = -1;
